ConnectionBuilder - Class in fr.upmc.components.connectors
The class ConnectionBuilder groups all the logic for the interconnection of components, implementing location-transparency for components by taking care care of identifying the possible cases (local versus remote) and building the correct connection for each case.

createComponent(String, Object[]) - Method in class fr.upmc.components.pre.dcc.connectors.DynamicComponentCreationConnector
 
createComponent(String, Object[]) - Method in class fr.upmc.components.pre.dcc.DynamicComponentCreator
create and start a component instantiated from the class of the given class name and initialised by the constructor which parameters are given.
createComponent(String, Object[]) - Method in interface fr.upmc.components.pre.dcc.interfaces.DynamicComponentCreationI
create a component from the class of the given class name, invoking its constructor matching the given parameters ; beware not to have parameters of base types (int, boolean, etc.) but rather reified versions (Integer, Boolean, etc.) in order for the reflection-based instantiation to work smoothly. .
createComponent(String, Object[]) - Method in class fr.upmc.components.pre.dcc.ports.DynamicComponentCreationInboundPort

createPullerThread() - Method in class fr.upmc.components.connectors.ActiveDataConnector
creates a puller thread that repeatedly calls the offering component to get a new datum that is then put into the data buffer, blocking if it is full.
createPusherThread() - Method in class fr.upmc.components.connectors.ActiveDataConnector
creates a pusher thread that calls the requiring component to receive a datum when a new one is available in the data buffer, blocking if the buffer is empty.
